def_cn: 草草记下，匆匆写下（地址等）
def_en: If you jot something short such as an address somewhere, you write it down so that you will remember it.
If you say that there is not a jot or not one jot of something, you are emphasizing that there is not even a very small amount of it.

def_cn: （用于强调否定陈述）丝毫，一点儿
def_en: Expressions such as a jot ,one jot ,not a jot are used to emphasize negative statements.
